name: Aldori Riposte
summary: Learn to strike back at your opponent when they fail to attack you.
description:
You riposte with your Aldori dueling sword when your enemy leaves an opening. Make a melee Strike or use a Disarm action against the triggering opponent using your Aldori dueling sword.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
trigger: An opponent within your reach critically fails a Strike against you.
